Description: Upper part of a round-topped limestone stela depicting Senusret III wearing the white crown and Queen Meresger(face lost).
Curator's comments: Published: HTBM 4: Plate 23 PM I Part 2: p.807
Bibliographic references: Hall 1913 / Catalogue of Egyptian scarabs, etc. in the British Museum (pl.23)
Quirke 1990 / Who were the Pharaohs? A History of their Names with a List of Cartouches (p53)
Associated names: Named in inscription & portrayed: Senusret III
Named in inscription & portrayed: Queen Meresger
Acquisition name: Donated by: Sir Augustus Wollaston Franks
